online-test-questions.question: Which of the following would be considered as most valuable by an Agile team?
Which methodology is known for frequent releases and osmotic communication?
Which of the following statements describes Scrum?
online-test-questions.option1: A methodology in which you practice only continuous integration and pair programming
online-test-questions.option2: A basic workflow visualization tool that enables you to optimize your work
online-test-questions.option3: A lightweight framework designed to develop and manage complex products in an iterative and incremental way

online-test-questions.question: A Product Owner wants a story to be completed in four days. The Development Team working on the Story reckons it will take seven days. The Scrum Master feels it should take five days. A subject matter expert, who has worked on similar Stories in the past, thinks it should take maximum three days.Whose estimate should be used for planning?
Which items on the product backlog should be small?
online-test-questions.option1: The items on the bottom of the Product Backlog
online-test-questions.option2: The items on the top of the Product Backlog
online-test-questions.option3: All items in the Product Backlog

online-test-questions.question: Agile planning happens at multiple levels. Which of the following terms best describes the multi-level planning?
During a release planning, the Product Backlog items are grouped into smaller releases that drive towards the product roadmap. Who plans a release?
Which of the following is the highest priority for an Agile project?
A Scrum of Scrums is a meeting between ________.
online-test-questions.option1: Only the Scrum Masters of all the Scrum teams
online-test-questions.option2: A couple of members from each Scrum team
online-test-questions.option3: A couple of members from each Scrum team

online-test-questions.question: In adopting Agile, Support and Maintenance teams have to primarily become used to ________.
